name: Jason Tsz-Yeung Wong
headline: Software Developer — Unity/C#, WebAR (8th Wall), React/Node
oneLiner: Co-author of PolyU’s AI driving-sim publication (Best Project nominee). Shipped 2,000+ CCU WebAR, built 1:1 HK route & 70+ rule checks, and scaled a Minecraft MMORPG (7,000 regs).

cards.title: About
cards.text: Unity simulation, WebAR, and full-stack web. I value reliability, measured outcomes, and thoughtful docs.

cards.title: Projects
cards.text: AI Driving Simulator (Case Study), PolyU Info Day WebAR, PetMatch MVP, WebAR Geofence Demo, Unity Tools.

cards.title: Experience
cards.text: GoToSim co-founder (2025–), PolyU contract dev (2024), 3CFORGE intern (2020), WishCraft (2017–2020).
